xs.description: Equal to the target font size

sm.description: 125% bigger than the target font size

md.description: 150% bigger than the target font size

lg.description: 175% bigger than the target font size

xl.description: 200% bigger than the target font size

ornamental.description: Primary font used for large headlines for marketing purposes.

basic.description: Primary font used for essential communication.
